title: Fix streaming markdown test failures
description:
**Summary:**
Streaming markdown tests are failing, possibly due to changes in streaming response handling or markdown rendering.

**Affected Test File:**
- `tests/ai/test_streaming_markdown.py` (6 failures)

**Investigation Tasks:**
1. Review test expectations vs actual streaming behavior
2. Check if streaming response format changed
3. Verify markdown rendering pipeline is intact
4. Look for async/await issues in streaming tests

**Technical Notes:**
- Check `src/consoul/ai/streaming.py` for streaming logic
- Verify Rich console markdown rendering behavior

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] All 6 streaming markdown tests pass
- [ ] Streaming markdown rendering works correctly in TUI
- [ ] No regressions in non-streaming markdown

**Context:**
May be related to other refactoring that changed streaming response handling. Need to investigate actual error messages from these specific tests.
